mil7.3.7:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kūpassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.3.7:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, kūpo rajjuñca varattañca laṅkārañca dhāreti;
mil7.3.7:1.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena satisampajaññasamannāgatena bhavitabbaṁ,
mil7.3.7:1.3_1: abhikkante paṭikkante ālokite vilokite samiñjite pasārite saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
mil7.3.7:1.3_2: asite pīte khāyite sāyite uccārapassāvakamme gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite
mil7.3.7:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kūpassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.3.7:1.5: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena ‘sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sampajāno, ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī’”ti.
